   25: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").

   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   29: 
   30: -export([tick/1, tick_intensity/1, tick_change/1,
   31:          connect_node/1,
   32:          nodenames/1, hostnames/1,
   33:          illegal_nodenames/1, hidden_node/1,
   34:          dyn_node_name/1,
   35:          epmd_reconnect/1,
   36: 	 setopts/1,
   37: 	 table_waste/1, net_setuptime/1,
   38: 	 inet_dist_options_options/1,
   39:          net_ticker_spawn_options/1,
   40: 
   41: 	 monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason/1,
   42: 	 monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason/1,
   43: 	 monitor_nodes_node_type/1,
   44: 	 monitor_nodes_misc/1,
   45: 	 monitor_nodes_otp_6481/1,
   46: 	 monitor_nodes_errors/1,
   47: 	 monitor_nodes_combinations/1,
   48: 	 monitor_nodes_cleanup/1,
   49: 	 monitor_nodes_many/1,
   50:          monitor_nodes_down_up/1,
   51:          dist_ctrl_proc_smoke/1,
   52:          dist_ctrl_proc_reject/1,
   53:          erl_uds_dist_smoke_test/1,
   54:          erl_1424/1, net_kernel_start/1, differing_cookies/1,
   55:          cmdline_setcookie_2/1, connection_cookie/1,
   56:          dyn_differing_cookies/1,
   57:          xdg_cookie/1]).
   58: 
   59: %% Performs the test at another node.
   60: -export([get_socket_priorities/0,
   61:          get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option/1,
   62: 	 tick_cli_test/3, tick_cli_test1/3,
   63: 	 tick_serv_test/2, tick_serv_test1/1,
   64: 	 run_remote_test/1,
   65:          dyn_node_name_do/2,
   66:          epmd_reconnect_do/2,
   67: 	 setopts_do/2,
   68:          setopts_deadlock_test/2,
   69: 	 keep_conn/1, time_ping/1,
   70:          ddc_remote_run/2]).
   71: 
   72: -export([net_kernel_start_do_test/1]).
   73: 
   74: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   75: 
   76: -export([dist_cntrlr_output_test_size/2]).
   77: 
   78: -export([pinger/1]).
   79: 
   80: -export([start_uds_rpc_server/1]).
   81: 
   82: -define(DUMMY_NODE,dummy@test01).
   83: -define(ALT_EPMD_PORT, "12321").
   84: -define(ALT_EPMD_CMD, "epmd -port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT).
   85: 
   86: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   87: %% The distribution is mainly tested in the big old test_suite.
   88: %% This test only tests the net_ticktime configuration flag.
   89: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
   90: %% erl -sname master -rsh ctrsh
   91: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   92: 
   93: suite() ->
   94:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   95:      {timetrap,{minutes,12}}].
   96: 
   97: all() -> 
   98:     [dist_ctrl_proc_smoke,
   99:      dist_ctrl_proc_reject,
  100:      tick, tick_intensity, tick_change, nodenames, hostnames,
  101:      illegal_nodenames, connect_node,
  102:      dyn_node_name,
  103:      epmd_reconnect,
  104:      hidden_node, setopts,
  105:      table_waste, net_setuptime, inet_dist_options_options,
  106:      net_ticker_spawn_options,
  107:      {group, monitor_nodes},
  108:      erl_uds_dist_smoke_test,
  109:      erl_1424, net_kernel_start,
  110:      {group, differing_cookies}].
  111: 
  112: groups() -> 
  113:     [{monitor_nodes, [],
  114:       [monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason,
  115:        monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason,
  116:        monitor_nodes_node_type, monitor_nodes_misc,
  117:        monitor_nodes_otp_6481, monitor_nodes_errors,
  118:        monitor_nodes_combinations, monitor_nodes_cleanup,
  119:        monitor_nodes_many,
  120:        monitor_nodes_down_up]},
  121:      {differing_cookies, [],
  122:       [differing_cookies,
  123:        cmdline_setcookie_2,
  124:        connection_cookie,
  125:        dyn_differing_cookies,
  126:        xdg_cookie]}].
  127: 
  128: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  129:     os:internal_init_cmd_shell(),
  130:     start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  131:     Config.
  132: 
  133: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  134:     [slave:stop(N) || N <- nodes()],
  135:     kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  136:     ok.
  137: 
  138: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  139:     Config.
  140: 
  141: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  142:     Config.
  143: 
  144: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC == hostnames;
  145:                                    TC == nodenames ->
  146:     file:make_dir("hostnames_nodedir"),
  147:     file:write_file("hostnames_nodedir/ignore_core_files",""),
  148:     Config;
  149: init_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, Config) ->
  150:     [] = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -relaxed_command_check -daemon"),
  151:     Config;
  152: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
  153:     Config.
  154: 
  155: end_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, _Config) ->
  156:     os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  157:     ok;
  158: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
  159:     ok.
  160: 
  161: connect_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  162:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  163:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(node()),
  164:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  165:     ok.
  166: 
  167: tick(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  168:     run_dist_configs(fun tick/2, Config).
  169: 
  170: tick(DCfg, Config) ->
  171:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, false).
  172: 
  173: tick_intensity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_intensity/2, Config).
  175: 
  176: tick_intensity(DCfg, Config) ->
  177:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, true).
  178: 
  179: tick_test(DCfg, _Config, CheckIntensityArg) ->
  180:     %%
  181:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  182:     %% global wont interfere...
  183:     %%
  184: 
  185:     [Name1, Name2] = get_nodenames(2, dist_test),
  186: 
  187:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1),
  188: 
  189:     case CheckIntensityArg of
  190:         true ->
  191:             %% Not for intensity test...
  192:             ok;
  193:         false ->
  194:             %% First check that the normal case is OK!
  195:             rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [node(), 8000, 16000]),
  196: 
  197:             erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  198:             receive
  199:                 {nodedown, Node} ->
  200:                     ct:fail("nodedown from other node")
  201:             after 30000 ->
  202:                     erlang:monitor_node(Node, false)
  203:             end,
  204:             ok
  205:     end,
  206: 
  207:     stop_node(Node),
  208: 
  209:     %% Now, set the net_ticktime for the other node to 12 secs.
  210:     %% After the sleep(2sec) and cast the other node shall destroy
  211:     %% the connection as it has not received anything on the connection.
  212:     %% The nodedown message should arrive within 8 < T < 16 secs.
  213: 
  214:     %% We must have two slave nodes as the slave mechanism otherwise
  215:     %% halts the client node after tick timeout (the connection is down
  216:     %% and the slave node decides to halt !!
  217: 
  218:     %% Set the ticktime on the server node to 100 secs so the server
  219:     %% node doesn't tick the client node within the interval ...
  220: 
  221:     {ok, ServNode} = start_node(DCfg, Name2,
  222: 				"-kernel net_ticktime 100 -connect_all false"),
  223:     rpc:call(ServNode, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test, [Node, node()]),
  224: 
  225:     %% We set min/max a second lower/higher than expected since it takes
  226:     %% time for termination of the dist controller, delivery of messages,
  227:     %% scheduling of the process receiving nodedown, etc...
  228:     {IArg, Min, Max} = case CheckIntensityArg of
  229:                            false ->
  230:                                {"", 7000, 17000};
  231:                            true ->
  232:                                {" -kernel net_tickintensity 24", 10500, 13500}
  233:                        end,
  234:     
  235:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1,
  236:                             "-kernel net_ticktime 12 -connect_all false" ++ IArg),
  237: 
  238:     rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [ServNode, Min, Max]),
  239: 
  240:     spawn_link(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [Node]),
  241: 
  242:     {tick_serv, ServNode} ! {i_want_the_result, self()},
  243: 
  244:     monitor_node(ServNode, true),
  245:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  246: 
  247:     receive
  248: 	{tick_test, T} when is_integer(T) ->
  249: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  250: 	    stop_node(Node),
  251:             io:format("Result: ~p~n", [T]),
  252: 	    T;
  253: 	{tick_test, Error} ->
  254: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  255: 	    stop_node(Node),
  256: 	    ct:fail(Error);
  257: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  258: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  259: 	    ct:fail("client node died");
  260: 	{nodedown, ServNode} ->
  261: 	    stop_node(Node),
  262: 	    ct:fail("server node died")
  263:     end,
  264:     ok.
  265: 
  266: %% Checks that pinging nonexistyent nodes does not waste space in distribution table.
  267: table_waste(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  268:     run_dist_configs(fun table_waste/2, Config).
  269: 
  270: table_waste(DCfg, _Config) ->
  271:     {ok, HName} = inet:gethostname(),
  272:     F = fun(0,_F) -> [];
  273: 	   (N,F) -> 
  274: 		Name = list_to_atom("erl_distribution_"++integer_to_list(N)++
  275: 					"@"++HName),
  276: 		pang = net_adm:ping(Name),
  277: 		F(N-1,F)
  278: 	end,
  279:     F(256,F),
  280:     {ok, N} = start_node(DCfg, erl_distribution_300),
  281:     stop_node(N),
  282:     ok.
  283: 
  284: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal name part works, and that illegal
  285: %% ones are filtered
  286: nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  287:     legal("a1@b"),
  288:     legal("a-1@b"),
  289:     legal("a_1@b"),
  290: 
  291:     %% Test that giving two -sname works as it should
  292:     started = test_node("a_1@b", false, long_or_short() ++ "a_0@b"),
  293: 
  294:     illegal("cdé@a"),
  295:     illegal("te欢st@a").
  296: 
  297: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal host part works, and that illegal
  298: %% ones are filtered
  299: hostnames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  300:     Host = gethostname(),
  301:     legal([$a,$@|atom_to_list(Host)]),
  302:     legal("1@b1"),
  303:     legal("b@b1-c"),
  304:     legal("c@b1_c"),
  305:     legal("d@b1#c"),
  306:     legal("f@::1"),
  307:     legal("g@1:bc3:4e3f:f20:0:1"),
  308: 
  309:     case file:native_name_encoding() of
  310:         latin1 -> ignore;
  311:         _ -> legal("e@b1é")
  312:     end,
  313:     long_hostnames(net_kernel:longnames()),
  314: 
  315:     illegal("h@testالع"),
  316:     illegal("i@языtest"),
  317:     illegal("j@te欢st").
  318: 
  319: long_hostnames(true) ->
  320:     legal("k@b.b.c"),
  321:     legal("l@b.b-c.d"),
  322:     legal("m@b.b_c.d"),
  323:     legal("n@127.0.0.1"),
  324:     legal("o@207.123.456.789");
  325: long_hostnames(false) ->
  326:     illegal("k@b.b.c").
  327: 
  328: legal(Name) ->
  329:     case test_node(Name) of
  330:         started ->
  331:             ok;
  332:         not_started ->
  333:             ct:fail("no ~p node started", [Name])
  334:     end.
  335: 
  336: illegal(Name) ->
  337:     case test_node(Name, true) of
  338:         not_started ->
  339:             ok;
  340:         started ->
  341:             ct:fail("~p node started with illegal name", [Name])
  342:     end.
  343: 
  344: test_node(Name) ->
  345:     test_node(Name, false).
  346: test_node(Name, Illegal) ->
  347:     test_node(Name, Illegal, "").
  348: test_node(Name, Illegal, ExtraArgs) ->
  349:     ProgName = ct:get_progname(),
  350:     Command = ProgName ++ " -noinput " ++
  351:         long_or_short() ++ Name ++ ExtraArgs ++
  352:         " -eval \"net_adm:ping('" ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ "')\"" ++
  353:         case Illegal of
  354:             true ->
  355:                 " -eval \"timer:sleep(10000),init:stop().\"";
  356:             false ->
  357:                 ""
  358:         end,
  359:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  360:     BinCommand = unicode:characters_to_binary(Command, utf8),
  361:     _Prt = open_port({spawn, BinCommand}, [stream,{cd,"hostnames_nodedir"}]),
  362:     Node = list_to_atom(Name),
  363:     receive
  364:         {nodeup, Node} ->
  365:             net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  366:             slave:stop(Node),
  367:             started
  368:     after 5000 ->
  369:         net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  370:         not_started
  371:     end.
  372: 
  373: long_or_short() ->
  374:     case net_kernel:longnames() of
  375:         true -> " -name ";
  376:         false -> " -sname "
  377:     end.
  378: 
  379: % get the localhost's name, depending on the using name policy
  380: gethostname() ->
  381:     Hostname = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  382:        true->
  383:            net_adm:localhost();
  384:        _->
  385:            {ok, Name}=inet:gethostname(),
  386:            Name
  387:     end,
  388:     list_to_atom(Hostname).
  389: 
  390: %% Test that pinging an illegal nodename does not kill the node.
  391: illegal_nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  392:     run_dist_configs(fun illegal_nodenames/2, Config).
  393: 
  394: illegal_nodenames(DCfg, _Config) ->
  395:     {ok, Node}=start_node(DCfg, illegal_nodenames),
  396:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  397:     RPid=rpc:call(Node, erlang, spawn,
  398: 		  [?MODULE, pinger, [self()]]),
  399:     receive
  400: 	{RPid, pinged} ->
  401:             monitor_node(Node, false),
  402: 	    ok;
  403: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  404: 	    ct:fail("Remote node died.")
  405:     end,
  406:     stop_node(Node),
  407:     ok.
  408: 
  409: pinger(Starter) ->
  410:     io:format("Starter:~p~n",[Starter]),
  411:     net_adm:ping(a@b@c),
  412:     Starter ! {self(), pinged},
  413:     ok.
  414: 
  415: 
  416: %% Test that you can set the net_setuptime properly.
  417: net_setuptime(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  418:     run_dist_configs(fun net_setuptime/2, Config).
  419: 
  420: net_setuptime(DCfg, _Config) ->
  421: 
  422:     %% In this test case, we reluctantly accept shorter times than the given
  423:     %% setup time, because the connection attempt can end in a
  424:     %% "Host unreachable" error before the timeout fires.
  425: 
  426:     Res0 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "2"),
  427:     io:format("Res0 = ~p", [Res0]),
  428:     true = (Res0 =< 4000),
  429:     Res1 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "0.3"),
  430:     io:format("Res1 = ~p", [Res1]),
  431:     true = (Res1 =< 500),
  432:     ok.
  433: 
  434: do_test_setuptime(DCfg, Setuptime) when is_list(Setuptime) ->
  435:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, dist_setuptime_test,
  436:                             "-kernel net_setuptime " ++ Setuptime),
  437:     Res = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,time_ping,[?DUMMY_NODE]),
  438:     stop_node(Node),
  439:     Res.
  440: 
  441: time_ping(Node) ->
  442:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  443:     pang = net_adm:ping(Node),
  444:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  445:     erlang:convert_time_unit(T1 - T0, native, millisecond).
  446: 
  447: %% Keep the connection with the client node up.
  448: %% This is necessary as the client node runs with much shorter
  449: %% tick time !!
  450: keep_conn(Node) ->
  451:     sleep(1),
  452:     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, time, []),
  453:     keep_conn(Node).
  454: 
  455: tick_serv_test(Node, MasterNode) ->
  456:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [MasterNode]),
  457:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test1, [Node]).
  458: 
  459: tick_serv_test1(Node) ->
  460:     register(tick_serv, self()),
  461:     TestServer = receive {i_want_the_result, TS} -> TS end,
  462:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  463:     receive
  464: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  465: 	    net_adm:ping(Node), %% Set up the connection again !!
  466: 
  467: 	    {tick_test, Node} ! {whats_the_result, self()},
  468: 	    receive
  469: 		{tick_test, Res} ->
  470: 		    TestServer ! {tick_test, Res}
  471: 	    end
  472:     end.
  473: 
  474: tick_cli_test(Node, Min, Max) ->
  475:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test1, [Node, Min, Max]).
  476: 
  477: tick_cli_test1(Node, Min, Max) ->
  478:     register(tick_test, self()),
  479:     erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  480:     sleep(2),
  481:     rpc:call(Node, erlang, time, []), %% simulate action on the connection
  482:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  483:     receive
  484: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  485: 	    T2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  486: 	    receive
  487: 		{whats_the_result, From} ->
  488: 		    Diff = erlang:convert_time_unit(T2-T1, native,
  489: 						    millisecond),
  490: 		    case Diff of
  491: 			T when Min =< T, T =< Max ->
  492: 			    From ! {tick_test, T};
  493: 			T ->
  494: 			    From ! {tick_test,
  495: 				    {"T not in interval "
  496:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Min)
  497:                                      ++ " =< T =< "
  498:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Max),
  499: 				     T}}
  500: 		    end
  501: 	    end
  502:     end.
  503: 
  504: epmd_reconnect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  505:     NodeNames = [N1,N2,N3] = get_nodenames(3, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  506:     Nodes = [atom_to_list(full_node_name(NN)) || NN <- NodeNames],
  507: 
  508:     DCfg = "-epmd_port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT,
  509: 
  510:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  511: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1" | Nodes]),
  512:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  513: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2" | Nodes]),
  514:     {_N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  515: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "3" | Nodes]),
  516:     Ports = [Port1, Port2, Port3],
  517: 
  518:     ok = reap_ports(Ports),
  519:    
  520:     ok.
  521: 
  522: reap_ports([]) ->
  523:     ok;
  524: reap_ports(Ports) ->
  525:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  526: 	{Port, Message} ->
  527:             case lists:member(Port, Ports) andalso Message of
  528:                 {data,String} ->
  529:                     io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  530:                     reap_ports(Ports);
  531:                 {exit_status,0} ->
  532:                     reap_ports(Ports -- [Port])
  533:             end
  534:     end.
  535:     
  536: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["1", Node1, Node2, Node3]) ->
  537:     Names = [Name || Name <- [hd(string:tokens(Node, "@")) || Node <- [Node1, Node2, Node3]]],
  538:     %% wait until all nodes are registered
  539:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  540:     "Killed" ++_ = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  541:     open_port({spawn, ?ALT_EPMD_CMD}, []),
  542:     %% check that all nodes reregister with epmd
  543:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  544:     lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  545:                           ANode = list_to_atom(Node),
  546:                           pong = net_adm:ping(ANode),
  547:                           {epmd_reconnect_do, ANode} ! {stop, Node1, Node}
  548:                   end, [Node2, Node3]),
  549:     ok;
  550: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["2", Node1, Node2, _Node3]) ->
  551:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  552:     receive {stop, Node1, Node2} ->
  553:             ok
  554:     after 7000 ->
  555:             exit(timeout)
  556:     end;
  557: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["3", Node1, _Node2, Node3]) ->
  558:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  559:     receive {stop, Node1, Node3} ->
  560:             ok
  561:     after 7000 ->
  562:             exit(timeout)
  563:     end.
  564: 
  565: wait_for_names(Names) ->
  566:     %% wait for up to 3 seconds (the current retry timer in erl_epmd is 2s)
  567:     wait_for_names(lists:sort(Names), 30, 100).
  568: 
  569: wait_for_names(Names, N, Wait) when N > 0 ->
  570:     try
  571:         {ok, Info} = erl_epmd:names(),
  572:         Names = lists:sort([Name || {Name, _Port} <- Info]),
  573:         ok
  574:     catch
  575:         error:{badmatch, _} ->
  576:             timer:sleep(Wait),
  577:             wait_for_names(Names, N-1, Wait)
  578:     end.
  579: 
  580: 
  581: dyn_node_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  582:     run_dist_configs(fun dyn_node_name/2, Config).
  583: 
  584: dyn_node_name(DCfg, _Config) ->
  585:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:get_state() of
  586:                      #{name_domain := shortnames} -> "shortnames";
  587:                      #{name_domain := longnames} -> "longnames"
  588:                  end,
  589:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg,
  590:                                           undefined, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  591:                                           ["dyn_node_name_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  592:                                            NameDomain]),
  593:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  594:     ok.
  595: 
  596: dyn_node_name_do(TestNode, [NameDomainStr]) ->
  597:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  598:     [] = nodes(),
  599:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  600:     NameDomain = list_to_atom(NameDomainStr),
  601:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  602:      name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  603:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type,all}]),
  604:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  605:     [] = nodes(),
  606:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  607:     MyName = node(),
  608:     false = (MyName =:= undefined),
  609:     false = (MyName =:= nonode@nohost),
  610:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  611:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  612:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  613: 
  614:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  615:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  616: 
  617:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(TestNode),
  618: 
  619:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  620:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  621: 
  622:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  623:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  624:     NodedownMsgA1 = receive_any(),
  625:     NodedownMsgA2 = receive_any(),
  626:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([NodedownMsgA1, NodedownMsgA2]),
  627: 
  628:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  629:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  630:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  631:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  632: 
  633:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  634:     [] = nodes(),
  635:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  636:     MyName = node(),
  637:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  638:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  639: 
  640:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  641: 
  642:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  643:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  644: 
  645:     true = rpc:cast(TestNode, net_kernel, disconnect, [MyName]),
  646: 
  647:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  648:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  649: 
  650:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  651:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  652:     NodedownMsgB1 = receive_any(),
  653:     NodedownMsgB2 = receive_any(),
  654:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([NodedownMsgB1, NodedownMsgB2]),
  655: 
  656:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  657:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  658:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  659:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  660:     ok.
  661: 
  662: check(X, X) -> ok.
  663: 
  664: setopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  665:     run_dist_configs(fun setopts/2, Config).
  666: 
  667: setopts(DCfg, _Config) ->
  668:     register(setopts_regname, self()),
  669:     [N1,N2,N3,N4,N5] = get_nodenames(5, setopts),
  670: 
  671:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  672: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1", "ping"]),
  673:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  674: 
  675:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  676: 				 ["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2", "ping"]),
  677:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port2),
  678: 
  679:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{packet,2}, {active,false}]),
  680:     {ok, LTcpPort} = inet:port(LSock),
  681: 
  682:     {N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  683: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  684: 					 "1", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  685:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N3F, Port3),
  686:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port3),
  687: 
  688:     {N4F,Port4} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N4, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  689: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  690: 					 "2", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  691:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N4F, Port4),
  692:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port4),
  693: 
  694:     %% net_kernel:setopts(new, _) used to be able to produce a deadlock
  695:     %% in net_kernel. GH-6129/OTP-18198
  696:     {N5F,Port5} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N5, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  697: 					["setopts_deadlock_test", atom_to_list(node()),
  698: 					 integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  699:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N5F, Port5),
  700:     repeat(fun () ->
  701:                    receive after 10 -> ok end,
  702:                    erlang:disconnect_node(N5F),
  703:                    WD = spawn_link(fun () ->
  704:                                            receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  705:                                            exit({net_kernel_probably_deadlocked, N5F})
  706:                                    end),
  707:                    pong = net_adm:ping(N5F),
  708:                    unlink(WD),
  709:                    exit(WD, kill),
  710:                    false = is_process_alive(WD)
  711:            end,
  712:            200),
  713:     try
  714:         erpc:call(N5F, erlang, halt, [])
  715:     catch
  716:         error:{erpc,noconnection} -> ok
  717:     end,
  718:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port5),
  719: 
  720:     unregister(setopts_regname),
  721:     ok.
  722: 
  723: wait_and_connect(LSock, NodeName, NodePort) ->
  724:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
  725:     {ok, "Connect please"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  726:     flush_from_port(NodePort),
  727:     pong = net_adm:ping(NodeName),
  728:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect done"),
  729:     gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  730: 
  731: 
  732: flush_from_port(Port) ->
  733:     flush_from_port(Port, 10).
  734: 
  735: flush_from_port(Port, Timeout) ->
  736:     receive
  737: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  738: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  739: 	    flush_from_port(Port, Timeout)
  740:     after Timeout ->
  741: 	    timeout
  742:     end.
  743: 
  744: wait_for_port_exit(Port) ->
  745:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  746: 	{Port,{exit_status,Status}} ->
  747: 	    Status;
  748: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  749: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  750: 	    wait_for_port_exit(Port)
  751:     end.
  752: 
  753: run_remote_test([FuncStr, TestNodeStr | Args]) ->
  754:     Status = try
  755: 	io:format("Node ~p started~n", [node()]),
  756: 	TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNodeStr),
  757: 	io:format("Node ~p spawning function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  758: 	{Pid,Ref} = spawn_monitor(?MODULE, list_to_atom(FuncStr), [TestNode, Args]),
  759: 	io:format("Node ~p waiting for function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  760: 	receive
  761: 	    {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, normal} ->
  762: 		0;
  763: 	    Other ->
  764: 		io:format("Node ~p got unexpected msg: ~p\n",[node(), Other]),
  765: 		1
  766: 	end
  767:     catch
  768: 	C:E:S ->
  769: 	    io:format("Node ~p got EXCEPTION ~p:~p\nat ~p\n",
  770: 		      [node(), C, E, S]),
  771: 	    2
  772:     end,
  773:     io:format("Node ~p doing halt(~p).\n",[node(), Status]),
  774:     erlang:halt(Status).
  775: 
  776: % Do the actual test on the remote node
  777: setopts_do(TestNode, [OptNr, ConnectData]) ->
  778:     [] = nodes(),
  779:     {Opt, Val} = opt_from_nr(OptNr),
  780:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{Opt, Val}]),
  781: 
  782:     [] = nodes(),
  783:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  784: 
  785:     case ConnectData of
  786: 	"ping" ->  % We connect
  787: 	    net_adm:ping(TestNode);
  788: 	TcpPort -> % Other connect
  789: 	    {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  790: 					 [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  791: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  792: 	    {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  793: 	    gen_tcp:close(Sock)
  794:     end,
  795:     [TestNode] = nodes(),
  796:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  797:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts('pixie@fairyland', [Opt]),
  798: 
  799:     NewVal = change_val(Val),
  800:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, NewVal}]),
  801:     {ok, [{Opt,NewVal}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  802: 
  803:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, Val}]),
  804:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  805: 
  806:     ok.
  807: 
  808: setopts_deadlock_test(_TestNode, [TcpPort]) ->
  809:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  810:                                  [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  811:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  812:     {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  813:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  814:     setopts_new_loop().
  815:     
  816: setopts_new_loop() ->
  817:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{nodelay, true}]),
  818:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
  819:     setopts_new_loop().
  820:     
  821: opt_from_nr("1") -> {nodelay, true};
  822: opt_from_nr("2") -> {nodelay, false}.
  823: 
  824: change_val(true)  -> false;
  825: change_val(false) -> true.
  826: 
  827: 
  828: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  829:     start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, erlang:get_cookie(), Mod, Func, Args).
  830: 
  831: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  832:     FullName = full_node_name(Name),
  833:     CmdLine =
  834:         mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args),
  835:     io:format("Starting node ~p: ~s~n", [FullName, CmdLine]),
  836:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, [exit_status]) of
  837: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
  838: 	    {FullName, Port};
  839: 	Error ->
  840: 	    exit({failed_to_start_node, FullName, Error})
  841:     end.
  842: 
  843: full_node_name(PreName) when is_atom(PreName) ->
  844:     full_node_name(atom_to_list(PreName));
  845: full_node_name(PreNameL) when is_list(PreNameL) ->
  846:     HostSuffix = lists:dropwhile(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
  847: 				 atom_to_list(node())),
  848:     list_to_atom(PreNameL ++ HostSuffix).
  849: 
  850: mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  851:     Static = "-noinput",
  852:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  853:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
  854: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
  855: 	       _ -> exit(no_progname_argument_found)
  856: 	   end,
  857:     NameSw = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  858: 		 false -> "-sname ";
  859: 		 true -> "-name ";
  860: 		 _ -> exit(not_distributed_node)
  861: 	     end,
  862:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  863:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
  864:     Prog ++ " "
  865: 	++ Static ++ " "
  866: 	++ NameSw ++ " " ++ NameStr
  867:         ++ " " ++ DCfg
  868: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
  869: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
  870: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(Cookie)
  871: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(Mod) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(Func)
  872: 	++ " " ++ string:join(Args, " ").
  873: 
  874: 
  875: %% OTP-4255.
  876: tick_change(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  877:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_change/2, Config).
  878: 
  879: tick_change(DCfg, _Config) ->
  880:     %%
  881:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  882:     %% global wont interfere...
  883:     %%
  884:     [BN, CN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  885:     DefaultTT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
  886:     unchanged = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 60),
  887:     case DefaultTT of
  888: 	I when is_integer(I) -> ok;
  889: 	_                 -> ct:fail(DefaultTT)
  890:     end,
  891: 
  892:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  893:     case nodes(connected) of
  894: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(10, 0);
  895: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  896: 			    set_net_ticktime, [10, 5])
  897:     end,
  898: 
  899:     wait_until(fun () -> 10 == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  900:     {ok, B} = start_node(DCfg, BN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -connect_all false"),
  901:     {ok, C} = start_node(DCfg, CN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -hidden"),
  902: 
  903:     OTE = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  904:     case catch begin
  905: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 10, 1),
  906: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 1, 10)
  907: 	       end of
  908: 	{'EXIT', Reason} ->
  909: 	    stop_node(B),
  910: 	    stop_node(C),
  911: 	    %% In case other nodes are connected
  912: 	    case nodes(connected) of
  913: 		[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  914: 		_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  915: 				    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 10])
  916: 	    end,
  917: 	    wait_until(fun () ->
  918: 			       DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()
  919: 		       end),
  920: 	    process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  921: 	    ct:fail(Reason);
  922: 	_ ->
  923: 	    ok
  924:     end,
  925:     process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  926:     stop_node(B),
  927:     stop_node(C),
  928: 
  929:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  930:     case nodes(connected) of
  931: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  932: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  933: 			    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 5])
  934:     end,
  935: 
  936:     wait_until(fun () -> DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  937:     ok.
  938: 
  939: 
  940: wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref) ->
  941:     receive
  942: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  943: 	    io:format("~p~n", [{node(), {nodedown, Node}}]),
  944: 	    Tester ! {Ref, {node(), {nodedown, Node}}}
  945:     end,
  946:     wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref).
  947: 
  948: run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, PrevTT, TT) ->
  949:     [DN, EN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  950: 
  951:     Tester = self(),
  952:     Ref = make_ref(),
  953:     MonitorNodes = fun (Nodes) ->
  954: 			   lists:foreach(
  955: 			     fun (N) ->
  956: 				     monitor_node(N,true)
  957: 			     end,
  958: 			     Nodes),
  959: 			   wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref)
  960: 		   end,
  961: 
  962:     {ok, D} = start_node(DCfg, DN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
  963: 			 ++ integer_to_list(PrevTT)),
  964: 
  965:     NMA = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([B, C, D]) end),
  966:     NMB = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), C, D]) end),
  967:     NMC = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, D]) end),
  968: 
  969:     MaxTT = case PrevTT > TT of
  970: 		true  -> PrevTT;
  971: 		false -> TT
  972: 	    end,
  973: 
  974:     CheckResult = make_ref(),
  975:     spawn_link(fun () ->
  976: 		       receive
  977: 		       after (25 + MaxTT)*1000 ->
  978: 			       Tester ! CheckResult
  979: 		       end
  980: 	       end),
  981: 
  982:     %% In case other nodes than these are connected
  983:     case nodes(connected) -- [B, C, D] of
  984: 	[] -> ok;
  985: 	OtherNodes -> rpc:multicall(OtherNodes, net_kernel,
  986: 				    set_net_ticktime, [TT, 20])
  987:     end,
  988: 
  989:     change_initiated = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  990:     {ongoing_change_to,_} = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  991:     sleep(3),
  992:     change_initiated = rpc:call(B,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,15]),
  993:     sleep(7),
  994:     change_initiated = rpc:call(C,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,10]),
  995: 
  996:     {ok, E} = start_node(DCfg, EN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
  997: 			 ++ integer_to_list(TT)),
  998:     NME  = spawn_link(E, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, C, D]) end),
  999:     NMA2 = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1000:     NMB2 = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1001:     NMC2 = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1002: 
 1003:     receive CheckResult -> ok end,
 1004: 
 1005:     unlink(NMA),  exit(NMA, kill),
 1006:     unlink(NMB),  exit(NMB, kill),
 1007:     unlink(NMC),  exit(NMC, kill),
 1008:     unlink(NME),  exit(NME, kill),
 1009:     unlink(NMA2), exit(NMA2, kill),
 1010:     unlink(NMB2), exit(NMB2, kill),
 1011:     unlink(NMC2), exit(NMC2, kill),
 1012: 
 1013:     %% The node not changing ticktime should have been disconnected from the
 1014:     %% other nodes
 1015:     receive {Ref, {Node, {nodedown, D}}} when Node == node() -> ok
 1016:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1017:     end,
 1018:     receive {Ref, {B, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1019:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1020:     end,
 1021:     receive {Ref, {C, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1022:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1023:     end,
 1024:     receive {Ref, {E, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1025:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1026:     end,
 1027: 
 1028:     %% No other connections should have been broken
 1029:     receive
 1030: 	{Ref, Reason} ->
 1031: 	    stop_node(E),
 1032: 	    exit({?LINE, Reason});
 1033: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when Pid == NMA;
 1034: 				   Pid == NMB;
 1035: 				   Pid == NMC;
 1036: 				   Pid == NME;
 1037: 				   Pid == NMA2;
 1038: 				   Pid == NMB2;
 1039: 				   Pid == NMC2 ->
 1040: 	    stop_node(E),
 1041: 
 1042: 	    exit({?LINE, {node(Pid), Reason}})
 1043:     after 0 ->
 1044: 	    TT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1045: 	    TT = rpc:call(B, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1046: 	    TT = rpc:call(C, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1047: 	    TT = rpc:call(E, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1048: 	    stop_node(E),
 1049: 	    ok
 1050:     end.
 1051: 
 1052: %%
 1053: %% Basic tests of hidden node.
 1054: %%
 1055: %% Basic test of hidden node.
 1056: hidden_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1057:     run_dist_configs(fun hidden_node/2, Config).
 1058: 
 1059: hidden_node(DCfg, Config) ->
 1060:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden", Config),
 1061:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden -hidden", Config),
 1062:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden true -hidden true", Config),
 1063:     ok.
 1064: 
 1065: hidden_node(DCfg, HArgs, _Config) ->
 1066:     ct:pal("--- Hidden argument(s): ~s~n", [HArgs]),
 1067:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1068:     VMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(V),
 1069:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1070:     %% Connect visible_node -> hidden_node
 1071:     connect_nodes(V, H),
 1072:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1073:     stop_node(H),
 1074:     sleep(5),
 1075:     check_monitor_nodes_res(VMN, H),
 1076:     stop_node(V),
 1077:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1078:     HMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(H),
 1079:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1080:     %% Connect hidden_node -> visible_node
 1081:     connect_nodes(H, V),
 1082:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1083:     stop_node(V),
 1084:     sleep(5),
 1085:     check_monitor_nodes_res(HMN, V),
 1086:     stop_node(H),
 1087:     ok.
 1088: 
 1089: connect_nodes(A, B) ->
 1090:     %% Check that they haven't already connected.
 1091:     false = lists:member(A, rpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1092:     false = lists:member(B, rpc:call(A, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1093:     %% Connect them.
 1094:     pong = rpc:call(A, net_adm, ping, [B]).
 1095: 
 1096: 
 1097: test_nodes(V, H) ->
 1098:     %% No nodes should be visible on hidden_node
 1099:     [] = rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, []),
 1100:     %% visible_node should be hidden on hidden_node
 1101:     true = lists:member(V, rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
 1102:     %% hidden_node node shouldn't be visible on visible_node
 1103:     false = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1104:     %% hidden_node should be hidden on visible_node
 1105:     true = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [hidden])).
 1106: 
 1107: mn_loop(MNs) ->
 1108:     receive
 1109: 	{nodeup, N} ->
 1110: 	    mn_loop([{nodeup, N}|MNs]);
 1111: 	{nodedown, N} ->
 1112: 	    mn_loop([{nodedown, N}|MNs]);
 1113: 	{monitor_nodes_result, Ref, From} ->
 1114: 	    From ! {Ref, MNs};
 1115: 	_ ->
 1116: 	    mn_loop(MNs)
 1117:     end.
 1118: 
 1119: start_monitor_nodes_proc(Node) ->
 1120:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1121:     Starter = self(),
 1122:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1123: 		fun() ->
 1124: 			net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1125: 			Starter ! Ref,
 1126: 			mn_loop([])
 1127: 		end),
 1128:     receive
 1129: 	Ref ->
 1130: 	    ok
 1131:     end,
 1132:     Pid.
 1133: 
 1134: 
 1135: check_monitor_nodes_res(Pid, Node) ->
 1136:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1137:     Pid ! {monitor_nodes_result, Ref, self()},
 1138:     receive
 1139: 	{Ref, MNs} ->
 1140: 	    false = lists:keysearch(Node, 2, MNs)
 1141:     end.
 1142: 
 1143: 
 1144: 
 1145: %% Check the kernel inet_dist_{listen,connect}_options options.
 1146: inet_dist_options_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1147:     Prio = 1,
 1148:     case gen_udp:open(0, [{priority,Prio}]) of
 1149: 	{ok,Socket} ->
 1150: 	    case inet:getopts(Socket, [priority]) of
 1151: 		{ok,[{priority,Prio}]} ->
 1152: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1153: 		    do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio);
 1154: 		_ ->
 1155: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1156: 		    {skip,
 1157: 		     "Can not set priority "++integer_to_list(Prio)++
 1158: 			 " on socket"}
 1159: 	    end;
 1160: 	{error,_} ->
 1161: 	    {skip, "Can not set priority on socket"}
 1162:     end.
 1163: 
 1164: do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio) ->
 1165:     PriorityString0 = "[{priority,"++integer_to_list(Prio)++"}]",
 1166:     PriorityString =
 1167: 	case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1168: 	    "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1169: 		PriorityString0;
 1170: 	    _ ->
 1171: 		%% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1172: 		"'"++PriorityString0++"'"
 1173: 	end,
 1174:     InetDistOptions =
 1175: 	"-hidden "
 1176: 	"-kernel inet_dist_connect_options "++PriorityString++" "
 1177: 	"-kernel inet_dist_listen_options "++PriorityString,
 1178:     {ok,Node1} =
 1179: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1180:     {ok,Node2} =
 1181: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1182:     %%
 1183:     pong =
 1184: 	rpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1185:     PrioritiesNode1 =
 1186: 	rpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1187:     PrioritiesNode2 =
 1188: 	rpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1189:     io:format("PrioritiesNode1 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode1]),
 1190:     io:format("PrioritiesNode2 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode2]),
 1191:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode1, P =:= Prio],
 1192:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode2, P =:= Prio],
 1193:     [_|_] = Elevated,
 1194:     %%
 1195:     stop_node(Node2),
 1196:     stop_node(Node1),
 1197:     ok.
 1198: 
 1199: get_socket_priorities() ->
 1200:     [Priority ||
 1201: 	{ok,[{priority,Priority}]} <-
 1202: 	    [inet:getopts(Port, [priority]) ||
 1203: 		Port <- erlang:ports(),
 1204: 		element(2, erlang:port_info(Port, name)) =:= "tcp_inet"]].
 1205: 
 1206: 
 1207: 
 1208: %% check net_ticker_spawn_options
 1209: net_ticker_spawn_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1210:     run_dist_configs(fun net_ticker_spawn_options/2, Config).
 1211: 
 1212: net_ticker_spawn_options(DCfg, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1213:     FullsweepString0 = "[{fullsweep_after,0}]",
 1214:     FullsweepString =
 1215:         case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1216:             "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1217:                 FullsweepString0;
 1218:             _ ->
 1219:                 %% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1220:                 "'"++FullsweepString0++"'"
 1221:         end,
 1222:     InetDistOptions =
 1223:         "-hidden "
 1224:         "-kernel net_ticker_spawn_options "++FullsweepString,
 1225:     {ok,Node1} =
 1226:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1227:     {ok,Node2} =
 1228:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1229:     %%
 1230:     pong =
 1231:         erpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1232:     FullsweepOptionNode1 =
 1233:         erpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node2]),
 1234:     FullsweepOptionNode2 =
 1235:         erpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node1]),
 1236:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode1 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode1]),
 1237:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode2 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode2]),
 1238:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode1,
 1239:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode2,
 1240:     %%
 1241:     stop_node(Node2),
 1242:     stop_node(Node1),
 1243:     ok.
 1244: 
 1245: get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option(Node) ->
 1246:     Links = case proplists:get_value(Node, erlang:system_info(dist_ctrl)) of
 1247:                 DistCtrl when is_port(DistCtrl) ->
 1248:                     {links, Ls} = erlang:port_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1249:                     Ls;
 1250:                 DistCtrl when is_pid(DistCtrl) ->
 1251:                     {links, Ls} = process_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1252:                     Ls
 1253:             end,
 1254:     Ticker = try
 1255:                  lists:foreach(
 1256:                    fun (Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 1257:                            {current_stacktrace, Stk}
 1258:                                = process_info(Pid, current_stacktrace),
 1259:                            lists:foreach(
 1260:                              fun ({dist_util, con_loop, _, _}) ->
 1261:                                      throw(Pid);
 1262:                                  (_) ->
 1263:                                      ok
 1264:                              end, Stk);
 1265:                        (_) ->
 1266:                            ok
 1267:                    end, Links),
 1268:                  error(no_ticker_found)
 1269:              catch
 1270:                  throw:Pid when is_pid(Pid) -> Pid
 1271:              end,
 1272:     {garbage_collection, GCOpts} = erlang:process_info(Ticker, garbage_collection),
 1273:     proplists:get_value(fullsweep_after, GCOpts).
 1274: 
 1275: 
 1276: 
 1277: %%
 1278: %% Testcase:
 1279: %%   monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason
 1280: %%
 1281: 
 1282: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1283:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1284: 
 1285: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1286:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1287:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1288:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1289: 
 1290:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(5, node),
 1291:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5] = Names,
 1292: 
 1293:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1, "-connect_all false"),
 1294:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-connect_all false"),
 1295:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-connect_all false"),
 1296:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1297: 
 1298:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1299:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1300:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1301: 
 1302:     receive {nodeup, N1, []} -> ok end,
 1303:     receive {nodeup, N2, []} -> ok end,
 1304:     receive {nodeup, N3, []} -> ok end,
 1305: 
 1306:     stop_node(N1),
 1307:     stop_node(N4),
 1308:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(N2),
 1309:     TickTime = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1310:     SleepTime = TickTime + (TickTime div 2),
 1311:     spawn(N3, fun () ->
 1312: 		      block_emu(SleepTime*1000),
 1313: 		      halt()
 1314: 	      end),
 1315: 
 1316:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1317:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1318:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1319: 
 1320:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{nodedown_reason, R1}]} -> connection_closed = R1 end,
 1321:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{nodedown_reason, R2}]} -> disconnect = R2 end,
 1322:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{nodedown_reason, R3}]} -> net_tick_timeout = R3 end,
 1323: 
 1324:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1325: 
 1326:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1327:     stop_node(N5),
 1328: 
 1329:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1330:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1331:     print_my_messages(),
 1332:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1333:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1334:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1335:     ok.
 1336: 
 1337: 
 1338: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1339:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1340: 
 1341: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1342:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1343:     Me = self(),
 1344:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1345:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason),
 1346:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, ""),
 1347:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1348: 		fun() ->
 1349: 			Me ! {stuff,
 1350: 			      self(),
 1351: 			      [make_ref(),
 1352: 			       {processes(), erlang:ports()}]}
 1353: 		end),
 1354:     receive {nodeup, Node, []} -> ok end,
 1355:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1356:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1357:     ComplexTerm = receive {stuff, Pid, _} = Msg ->
 1358: 			  {Msg, term_to_binary(Msg)}
 1359: 		  end,
 1360:     exit(Owner, ComplexTerm),
 1361:     receive
 1362: 	{nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, NodeDownReason}]} ->
 1363: 	    ok
 1364:     end,
 1365:     %% If the complex nodedown_reason messed something up garbage collections
 1366:     %% are likely to dump core
 1367:     garbage_collect(),
 1368:     garbage_collect(),
 1369:     garbage_collect(),
 1370:     ComplexTerm = NodeDownReason,
 1371:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1372:     no_msgs(),
 1373:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1374:     ok.
 1375: 
 1376:

 1385:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_node_type/2, Config).
 1386: 
 1387: monitor_nodes_node_type(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1388:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1389:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1390:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}]),
 1391:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(9, node),
 1392:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5, NN6, NN7, NN8, NN9] = Names,
 1393: 
 1394:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1395:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2),
 1396:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-hidden"),
 1397:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1398: 
 1399:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1400:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1401: 
 1402:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1403:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1404:     receive {nodeup, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1405:     receive {nodeup, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1406: 
 1407:     stop_node(N1),
 1408:     stop_node(N2),
 1409:     stop_node(N3),
 1410:     stop_node(N4),
 1411: 
 1412:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1413:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1414: 
 1415:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1416:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1417:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1418:     receive {nodedown, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1419: 
 1420:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}]),
 1421:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1422: 
 1423:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1424:     stop_node(N5),
 1425:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1426: 
 1427:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1428:     {ok, N6} = start_node(DCfg, NN6),
 1429:     {ok, N7} = start_node(DCfg, NN7, "-hidden"),
 1430: 
 1431: 
 1432:     receive {nodeup, N6} -> ok end,
 1433:     receive {nodeup, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1434:     stop_node(N6),
 1435:     stop_node(N7),
 1436: 
 1437:     receive {nodedown, N6} -> ok end,
 1438:     receive {nodedown, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1439: 
 1440:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1441:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1442:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1443: 
 1444:     {ok, N8} = start_node(DCfg, NN8),
 1445:     {ok, N9} = start_node(DCfg, NN9, "-hidden"),
 1446: 
 1447:     receive {nodeup, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1448:     stop_node(N8),
 1449:     stop_node(N9),
 1450: 
 1451:     receive {nodedown, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1452:     print_my_messages(),
 1453:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1454:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1455:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1456:     ok.
