 1459: %%
 1460: %% Testcase:
 1461: %%   monitor_nodes
 1462: %%
 1463: 
 1464: monitor_nodes_misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1465:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_misc/2, Config).
 1466: 
 1467: monitor_nodes_misc(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1468:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1469:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1470:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1471:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1472:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1473:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1474:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(3, node),
 1475:     [NN1, NN2, NN3] = Names,
 1476: 
 1477:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1478:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-hidden"),
 1479: 
 1480:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1481: 
 1482:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible}} -> ok end,
 1483:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden}} -> ok end,
 1484:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1485:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1486: 
 1487:     NodesInfo = erlang:nodes(connected, #{connection_id => true}),
 1488: 
 1489:     {N1, #{connection_id := N1CId}} = lists:keyfind(N1, 1, NodesInfo),
 1490:     {N2, #{connection_id := N2CId}} = lists:keyfind(N2, 1, NodesInfo),
 1491: 
 1492:     ct:pal("N1: ~p ~p~n", [N1, N1CId]),
 1493:     ct:pal("N2: ~p ~p~n", [N2, N2CId]),
 1494: 
 1495:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible, connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1496:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden, connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1497: 
 1498:     N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},{connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1499:     N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},{connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1500: 
 1501:     receive {nodeup, N1, UpN1Info} -> N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN1Info) end,
 1502:     receive {nodeup, N2, UpN2Info} -> N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN2Info) end,
 1503: 
 1504:     stop_node(N1),
 1505:     stop_node(N2),
 1506: 
 1507:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1508: 
 1509:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1510:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1511:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1512:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1513:                              connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1514:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1515:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1516:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1517:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1518:                              connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1519: 
 1520:     N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1521:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1522:     N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1523:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1524:                                     {connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1525:     N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1526:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1527:     N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1528:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1529:                                     {connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1530: 
 1531:     receive
 1532:         {nodedown, N1, N1Info1} ->
 1533:             case lists:sort(N1Info1) of
 1534:                 N1ADownInfoSorted ->
 1535:                     receive
 1536:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1537:                             N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1538:                     end;
 1539:                 N1BDownInfoSorted ->
 1540:                     receive
 1541:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1542:                             N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1543:                     end
 1544:             end
 1545:     end,
 1546:     receive
 1547:         {nodedown, N2, N2Info1} ->
 1548:             case lists:sort(N2Info1) of
 1549:                 N2ADownInfoSorted ->
 1550:                     receive
 1551:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1552:                             N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1553:                     end;
 1554:                 N2BDownInfoSorted ->
 1555:                     receive
 1556:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1557:                             N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1558:                     end
 1559:             end
 1560:     end,
 1561: 
 1562:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1563:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1564:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1565:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1566: 
 1567:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3),
 1568:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1569:     stop_node(N3),
 1570:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1571:     print_my_messages(),
 1572:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1573:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1574:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1575:     ok.
 1576: 
 1577: 
 1578: %% Tests that {nodeup, Node} messages are received before
 1579: %% messages from Node and that {nodedown, Node} messages are
 1580: %% received after messages from Node.
 1581: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1582:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_otp_6481/2, Config).
 1583: 
 1584: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(DCfg, Config) ->
 1585:     io:format("Testing nodedown...~n"),
 1586:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodedown),
 1587:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1588:     io:format("Testing nodeup...~n"),
 1589:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodeup),
 1590:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1591:     ok.
 1592: 
 1593: monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, TestType) when is_list(Config) ->
 1594:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1595:     NodeMsg = make_ref(),
 1596:     Me = self(),
 1597:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_otp_6481),
 1598:     case TestType of
 1599: 	nodedown -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true);
 1600: 	nodeup -> ok
 1601:     end,
 1602:     Seq = lists:seq(1,10000),
 1603:     MN = spawn_link(
 1604: 	   fun () ->
 1605: 		   lists:foreach(
 1606: 		     fun (_) ->
 1607: 			     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1608: 		     end,
 1609: 		     Seq),
 1610: 		   Me ! {mon_set, self()},
 1611: 		   receive after infinity -> ok end
 1612: 	   end),
 1613:     receive {mon_set, MN} -> ok end,
 1614:     case TestType of
 1615: 	nodedown -> ok;
 1616: 	nodeup -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1617:     end,
 1618: 
 1619:     %% Whitebox:
 1620:     %% nodedown test: Since this process was the first one monitoring
 1621:     %%                nodes this process will be the first one notified
 1622:     %%                on nodedown.
 1623:     %% nodeup test:   Since this process was the last one monitoring
 1624:     %%                nodes this process will be the last one notified
 1625:     %%                on nodeup
 1626: 
 1627:     %% Verify the monitor_nodes order expected
 1628:     TestMonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1629:     %% io:format("~p~n", [TestMonNodeState]),
 1630:     TestMonNodeState =
 1631: 	case TestType of
 1632: 	    nodedown -> [];
 1633: 	    nodeup -> [{self(), []}]
 1634: 	end
 1635: 	++ lists:map(fun (_) -> {MN, []} end, Seq)
 1636: 	++ case TestType of
 1637: 	       nodedown -> [{self(), []}];
 1638: 	       nodeup -> []
 1639: 	   end
 1640: 	++ MonNodeState,
 1641: 
 1642:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, "", this),
 1643:     receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end,
 1644: 
 1645:     RemotePid = spawn(Node,
 1646: 		      fun () ->
 1647: 			      receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 1648: 			      %% infinite loop of msgs
 1649: 			      %% we want an endless stream of messages and the kill
 1650: 			      %% the node mercilessly.
 1651: 			      %% We then want to ensure that the nodedown message arrives
 1652: 			      %% last ... without garbage after it.
 1653: 			      _ = spawn(fun() -> node_loop_send(Me, NodeMsg, 1) end),
 1654: 			      receive {Me, kill_it} -> ok end,
 1655: 			      halt()
 1656: 		      end),
 1657: 
 1658:     net_kernel:disconnect(Node),
 1659:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1660: 
 1661:     %% Verify that '{nodeup, Node}' comes before '{NodeMsg, 1}' (the message
 1662:     %% bringing up the connection).
 1663:     {nodeup, Node} = receive Msg1 -> Msg1 end,
 1664:     {NodeMsg, N}   = receive Msg2 -> Msg2 end,
 1665:     %% msg stream has begun, kill the node
 1666:     RemotePid ! {self(), kill_it},
 1667: 
 1668:     %% Verify that '{nodedown, Node}' comes after the last '{NodeMsg, N}'
 1669:     %% message.
 1670:     {nodedown, Node} = flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1),
 1671:     no_msgs(500),
 1672: 
 1673:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, MN),
 1674:     unlink(MN),
 1675:     exit(MN, bang),
 1676:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, MN, bang} -> ok end,
 1677:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1678:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1679:     ok.
 1680: 
 1681: flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, No) ->
 1682:     case receive Msg -> Msg end of
 1683: 	{NodeMsg, N} when N >= No ->
 1684: 	    flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1);
 1685: 	OtherMsg ->
 1686: 	    OtherMsg
 1687:     end.
 1688: 
 1689: node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No) ->
 1690:     Pid ! {Msg, No},
 1691:     node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No + 1).
 1692: 
 1693: monitor_nodes_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1694:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1695:     error = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(asdf),
 1696:     {error,
 1697:      {unknown_options,
 1698:       [gurka]}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1699: 					   [gurka]),
 1700:     {error,
 1701:      {unknown_options,
 1702:       #{gurka := true}}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1703:                                                     #{gurka => true}),
 1704:     {error,
 1705:      {invalid_options,
 1706:       gurka}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1707: 					 gurka),
 1708:     {error,
 1709:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1710:       [{node_type,visible},
 1711:        {node_type,hidden}]}}
 1712: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1713: 				   [{node_type,hidden},
 1714: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1715:     {error,
 1716:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1717:       [{node_type,visible},
 1718:        {node_type,all}]}}
 1719: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1720: 				   [{node_type,all},
 1721: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1722:     {error,
 1723:      {bad_option_value,
 1724:       {node_type,
 1725:        blaha}}}
 1726: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, blaha}]),
 1727:     {error,
 1728:      {bad_option_value,
 1729:       #{node_type := blaha}}}
 1730: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => blaha}),
 1731:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1732:     ok.
 1733: 
 1734: monitor_nodes_combinations(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1735:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_combinations/2, Config).
 1736: 
 1737: monitor_nodes_combinations(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1738:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1739:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1740:     [VisibleName, HiddenName] = get_nodenames(2,
 1741: 					      monitor_nodes_combinations),
 1742:     {ok, Visible} = start_node(DCfg, VisibleName, ""),
 1743:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Visible),
 1744:     no_msgs(),
 1745:     stop_node(Visible),
 1746:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Visible, connection_closed),
 1747:     no_msgs(),
 1748:     {ok, Hidden} = start_node(DCfg, HiddenName, "-hidden"),
 1749:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Hidden),
 1750:     no_msgs(),
 1751:     stop_node(Hidden),
 1752:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Hidden, connection_closed),
 1753:     no_msgs(),
 1754:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1755:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1756:     no_msgs(),
 1757:     ok.
 1758: 
 1759: monitor_nodes_all_comb(Flag) ->
 1760:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag),
 1761:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1762: 				  [nodedown_reason]),
 1763:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1764: 				  [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1765:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1766: 				  [{node_type, visible}]),
 1767:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1768: 				  [{node_type, all}]),
 1769:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1770: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1771: 				   {node_type, hidden}]),
 1772:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1773: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1774: 				   {node_type, visible}]),
 1775:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1776: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1777: 				   {node_type, all}]),
 1778:     %% There currently are 8 different combinations
 1779:     8.
 1780: 
 1781: 
 1782: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Node) ->
 1783:     io:format("Receive nodeup visible...~n"),
 1784:     Exp = [{nodeup, Node},
 1785: 	   {nodeup, Node, []}]
 1786: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(visible, Node),
 1787:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1788:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1789:     ok;
 1790: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Node) ->
 1791:     io:format("Receive nodeup hidden...~n"),
 1792:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(hidden, Node),
 1793:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1794:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1795:     ok.
 1796: 
 1797: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(Type, Node) ->
 1798:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1799:     [{nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1800:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1801:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1802:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt}].
 1803: 
 1804: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Node, Reason) ->
 1805:     io:format("Receive nodedown visible...~n"),
 1806:     Exp = [{nodedown, Node},
 1807: 	   {nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, Reason}]}]
 1808: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(visible,
 1809: 						   Node,
 1810: 						   Reason),
 1811:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1812:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1813:     ok;
 1814: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Node, Reason) ->
 1815:     io:format("Receive nodedown hidden...~n"),
 1816:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(hidden, Node, Reason),
 1817:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1818:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1819:     ok.
 1820: 
 1821: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(Type, Node, Reason) ->
 1822:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1823:     InfoNdrNt = lists:sort([{nodedown_reason, Reason}]++InfoNt),
 1824:     [{nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1825:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1826:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt},
 1827:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt}].
 1828: 
 1829: receive_mn_msgs([]) ->
 1830:     ok;
 1831: receive_mn_msgs(Msgs) ->
 1832:     io:format("Expecting msgs: ~p~n", [Msgs]),
 1833:     receive
 1834: 	{_Dir, _Node} = Msg ->
 1835: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1836: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1837: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1838: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1839: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1840: 	    end;
 1841: 	{Dir, Node, Info} ->
 1842: 	    Msg = {Dir, Node, lists:sort(Info)},
 1843: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1844: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1845: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1846: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1847: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1848: 	    end;
 1849: 	Msg ->
 1850: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1851: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1852: 		     expected_messages, Msgs})
 1853:     end.
 1854: 
 1855: monitor_nodes_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1856:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1857:     Me = self(),
 1858:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1859:     Inf = spawn(fun () ->
 1860: 			monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1861: 			Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1862: 			receive after infinity -> ok end
 1863: 		end),
 1864:     TO = spawn(fun () ->
 1865: 		       monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1866: 		       Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1867: 		       receive after 500 -> ok end
 1868: 	       end),
 1869:     receive {mons_set, Inf} -> ok end,
 1870:     receive {mons_set, TO} -> ok end,
 1871:     MNLen = length(MonNodeState) + No*3,
 1872:     MNLen = length(monitor_node_state()),
 1873:     MonInf = erlang:monitor(process, Inf),
 1874:     MonTO = erlang:monitor(process, TO),
 1875:     exit(Inf, bang),
 1876:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1877:     receive {'DOWN', MonInf, process, Inf, bang} -> ok end,
 1878:     receive {'DOWN', MonTO, process, TO, normal} -> ok end,
 1879:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1880:     no_msgs(),
 1881:     ok.
 1882: 
 1883: monitor_nodes_many(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1884:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_many/2, Config).
 1885: 
 1886: monitor_nodes_many(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1887:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1888:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_many),
 1889:     %% We want to perform more than 2^16 net_kernel:monitor_nodes
 1890:     %% since this will wrap an internal counter
 1891:     No = (1 bsl 16) + 17,
 1892:     repeat(fun () -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true) end, No),
 1893:     No = length(monitor_node_state()) - length(MonNodeState),
 1894:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name),
 1895:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1896:     stop_node(Node),
 1897:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1898:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1899:     no_msgs(10),
 1900:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1901:     ok.
 1902: 
 1903: %% Test order of messages nodedown and nodeup.
 1904: monitor_nodes_down_up(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1905:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1906:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(Node),
 1907:     monitor_nodes_yoyo(Node),
 1908:     peer:stop(Peer).
 1909: 
 1910: monitor_nodes_yoyo(A) ->
 1911:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1912:     Papa = self(),
 1913: 
 1914:     %% Spawn lots of processes doing one erlang:monitor_node(A,true) each
 1915:     %% just to get lots of other monitors to fire when connection goes down
 1916:     %% and thereby give time for {nodeup,A} to race before {nodedown,A}.
 1917:     NodeMonCnt = 10000,
 1918:     NodeMons = [my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1919:                                      monitor_node = receive_any(),
 1920:                                      monitor_node(A, true),
 1921:                                      Papa ! ready,
 1922:                                      {nodedown, A} =  receive_any(),
 1923:                                      F()
 1924:                              end,
 1925:                              [link, monitor, {priority, low}])
 1926:                 ||
 1927:                    _ <- lists:seq(1, NodeMonCnt)],
 1928: 
 1929:     %% Spawn message spamming process to trigger new connection setups
 1930:     %% as quick as possible.
 1931:     Spammer = my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1932:                                    {dummy, A} ! trigger_auto_connect,
 1933:                                    F()
 1934:                            end,
 1935:                            [link, monitor]),
 1936: 
 1937:     %% Now bring connection down and verify we get {nodedown,A} before {nodeup,A}.
 1938:     Yoyos = 20,
 1939:     [begin
 1940:          [P ! monitor_node || P <- NodeMons],
 1941:          [receive ready -> ok end || _ <- NodeMons],
 1942: 
 1943:          Owner = get_conn_owner(A),
 1944:          exit(Owner, kill),
 1945: 
 1946:          {nodedown, A} = receive_any(),
 1947:          {nodeup, A} = receive_any()
 1948:      end
 1949:      || _ <- lists:seq(1,Yoyos)],
 1950: 
 1951:     unlink(Spammer),
 1952:     exit(Spammer, die),
 1953:     receive {'DOWN',_,process,Spammer,_} -> ok end,
 1954: 
 1955:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P, die) end || P <- NodeMons],
 1956:     [receive {'DOWN',_,process,P,_} -> ok end || P <- NodeMons],
 1957: 
 1958:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1959:     ok.
 1960: 
 1961: receive_any() ->
 1962:     receive_any(infinity).
 1963: 
 1964: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1965:     receive
 1966:         M -> M
 1967:     after
 1968:         Timeout -> timeout
 1969:     end.
 1970: 
 1971: my_spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) ->
 1972:     case spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) of
 1973:         {Pid, _Mref} -> Pid;
 1974:         Pid -> Pid
 1975:     end.
 1976: 
 1977: get_conn_owner(Node) ->
 1978:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1979:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1980:     Owner.
 1981: 
 1982: dist_ctrl_proc_smoke(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1983:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME)).
 1984: 
 1985: dist_ctrl_proc_reject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1986:     ToReject = combinations(dist_util:rejectable_flags()),
 1987:     lists:map(fun(Flags) ->
 1988:                       ct:log("Try to reject ~p",[Flags]),
 1989:                       dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1990:                         "-gen_tcp_dist_reject_flags " ++ integer_to_list(Flags))
 1991:               end, ToReject).
 1992: 
 1993: combinations([H | T]) ->
 1994:     lists:flatten([[(1 bsl H) bor C || C <- combinations(T)] | combinations(T)]);
 1995: combinations([]) ->
 1996:     [0];
 1997: combinations(BitField) ->
 1998:     lists:sort(combinations(bits(BitField, 0))).
 1999: 
 2000: bits(0, _) ->
 2001:     [];
 2002: bits(BitField, Cnt) when BitField band 1 == 1 ->
 2003:     [Cnt | bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1)];
 2004: bits(BitField, Cnt) ->
 2005:     bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1).
 2006: 
 2007: dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes) ->
 2008:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes,"").
 2009: 
 2010: dist_ctrl_proc_test([Name1,Name2], Extra) ->
 2011:     ThisNode = node(),
 2012:     GenTcpOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp "
 2013:         "-gen_tcp_dist_output_loop " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " " ++
 2014:         "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size " ++ Extra,
 2015:     {ok, Node1} = start_node("", Name1, "-proto_dist gen_tcp"),
 2016:     {ok, Node2} = start_node("", Name2, GenTcpOptProlog),
 2017:     NL = lists:sort([ThisNode, Node1, Node2]),
 2018:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2019:                        NL == lists:sort([node()|nodes()])
 2020:                end),
 2021:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2022:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node1,erlang, node, [])
 2023:                                          | rpc:call(Node1, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2024:                end),
 2025:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2026:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node2,erlang, node, [])
 2027:                                          | rpc:call(Node2, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2028:                end),
 2029: 
 2030:     smoke_communicate(Node1, gen_tcp_dist, dist_cntrlr_output_loop),
 2031:     smoke_communicate(Node2, erl_distribution_SUITE, dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size),
 2032: 
 2033:     stop_node(Node1),
 2034:     stop_node(Node2),
 2035:     ok.
 2036: 
 2037: smoke_communicate(Node, OLoopMod, OLoopFun) ->
 2038:     %% Verify that we actually are executing the distribution
 2039:     %% module we expect and also massage message passing over
 2040:     %% the connection a bit...
 2041:     Ps = rpc:call(Node, erlang, processes, []),
 2042:     try
 2043:         lists:foreach(
 2044:           fun (P) ->
 2045:                   case rpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P, current_stacktrace]) of
 2046:                       undefined ->
 2047:                           ok;
 2048:                       {current_stacktrace, StkTrace} ->
 2049:                           lists:foreach(fun ({Mod, Fun, 2, _}) when Mod == OLoopMod,
 2050:                                                                     Fun == OLoopFun ->
 2051:                                                 io:format("~p ~p~n", [P, StkTrace]),
 2052:                                                 throw(found_it);
 2053:                                             (_) ->
 2054:                                                 ok
 2055:                                         end, StkTrace)
 2056:                   end
 2057:           end, Ps),
 2058:         exit({missing, {OLoopMod, OLoopFun}})
 2059:     catch
 2060:         throw:found_it -> ok
 2061:     end,
 2062:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1000,100)),
 2063:     BitStr = <<0:7999>>,
 2064:     List = [[Bin], atom, [BitStr|Bin], make_ref(), [[[BitStr|"hopp"]]],
 2065:             4711, 111122222211111111111111,"hej", fun () -> ok end, BitStr,
 2066:             self(), fun erlang:node/1],
 2067:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, fun () -> receive {From1, Msg1} -> From1 ! Msg1 end,
 2068:                                      receive {From2, Msg2} -> From2 ! Msg2 end
 2069:                            end),
 2070:     R = make_ref(),
 2071:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List]},
 2072:     receive [R, L1] -> List = L1 end,
 2073: 
 2074:     %% Send a huge message in order to trigger message fragmentation if enabled
 2075:     FragBin = <<0:(2*(1024*64*8))>>,
 2076:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List, FragBin]},
 2077:     receive [R, L2, B] -> List = L2, FragBin = B end,
 2078: 
 2079:     unlink(Pid),
 2080:     exit(Pid, kill),
 2081:     ok.
 2082: 
 2083: 
 2084: erl_uds_dist_smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2085:     case os:type() of
 2086:         {win32,_} ->
 2087:             {skipped, "Not on Windows"};
 2088:         _ ->
 2089:             do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test()
 2090:     end.
 2091: 
 2092: do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test() ->
 2093:     [Node1, Node2] = lists:map(fun (Name) ->
 2094:                                        list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@localhost")
 2095:                                end,
 2096:                                get_nodenames(2, erl_uds_dist_smoke_test)),
 2097:     {LPort, Acceptor} = uds_listen(),
 2098:     start_uds_node(Node1, LPort),
 2099:     start_uds_node(Node2, LPort),
 2100:     receive
 2101:         {uds_nodeup, N1} ->
 2102:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N1])
 2103:     end,
 2104:     receive
 2105:         {uds_nodeup, N2} ->
 2106:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N2])
 2107:     end,
 2108:     
 2109:     io:format("Testing ping net_adm:ping(~p) on ~p~n", [Node2, Node1]),
 2110:     Node1 ! {self(), {net_adm, ping, [Node2]}},
 2111:     receive
 2112:         {Node1, PingRes} ->
 2113:             io:format("~p~n", [PingRes]),
 2114:             pong = PingRes
 2115:     end,
 2116: 
 2117:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node1]),
 2118:     Node1 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2119:     receive
 2120:         {Node1, N1List} ->
 2121:             io:format("~p~n", [N1List]),
 2122:             [Node2] = N1List
 2123:     end,
 2124: 
 2125:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node2]),
 2126:     Node2 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2127:     receive
 2128:         {Node2, N2List} ->
 2129:             io:format("~p~n", [N2List]),
 2130:             [Node1] = N2List
 2131:     end,
 2132: 
 2133:     io:format("Shutting down~n", []),
 2134: 
 2135:     Node1 ! {self(), close},
 2136:     Node2 ! {self(), close},
 2137: 
 2138:     receive {Node1, C1} -> ok = C1 end,
 2139:     receive {Node2, C2} -> ok = C2 end,
 2140: 
 2141:     unlink(Acceptor),
 2142:     exit(Acceptor, kill),
 2143: 
 2144:     io:format("ok~n", []),
 2145: 
 2146:     ok.
 2147: 
 2148: %% Helpers for testing the erl_uds_dist example
 2149: 
 2150: uds_listen() ->
 2151:     Me = self(),
 2152:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
 2153:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 2154:     {LPort, spawn_link(fun () ->
 2155:                                uds_accept_loop(LSock, Me)
 2156:                        end)}.
 2157: 
 2158: uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc) ->
 2159:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 2160:     _ = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2161:                            uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc)
 2162:                    end),
 2163:     uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc).
 2164: 
 2165: uds_rpc(Sock, MFA) ->
 2166:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(MFA)),
 2167:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2168:         {error, Reason} ->
 2169:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2170:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2171:             binary_to_term(Packet)
 2172:     end.
 2173: 
 2174: uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc) ->
 2175:     case uds_rpc(Sock, {erlang, node, []}) of
 2176:         nonode@nohost ->
 2177:             %% Wait for distribution to come up...
 2178:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2179:             uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc);
 2180:         Node when is_atom(Node) ->
 2181:             register(Node, self()),
 2182:             TestProc ! {uds_nodeup, Node},
 2183:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2184:     end.
 2185: 
 2186: uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node) ->
 2187:     receive
 2188:         {From, close} ->
 2189:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(close)),
 2190:             From ! {Node, gen_tcp:close(Sock)},
 2191:             exit(normal);
 2192:         {From, ApplyData} ->
 2193:             From ! {Node, uds_rpc(Sock, ApplyData)},
 2194:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2195:     end.
 2196: 
 2197: uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock) ->
 2198:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2199:         {error, Reason} ->
 2200:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2201:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2202:             case binary_to_term(Packet) of
 2203:                 {M, F, A} when is_atom(M), is_atom(F), is_list(A) ->
 2204:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(M, F, A)));
 2205:                 {F, A} when is_function(F), is_list(A) ->
 2206:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(F, A)));
 2207:                 close ->
 2208:                     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 2209:                     exit(normal);
 2210:                 Other ->
 2211:                     error({unexpected_data, Other})
 2212:             end
 2213:     end,
 2214:     uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock).
 2215: 
 2216: start_uds_rpc_server([PortString]) ->
 2217:     Port = list_to_integer(PortString),
 2218:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2219:                                        {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port,
 2220:                                                                     [binary, {packet, 4},
 2221:                                                                      {active, false}]),
 2222:                                        uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock)
 2223:                                end),
 2224:     receive
 2225:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 2226:             if Reason == normal ->
 2227:                     halt();
 2228:                true ->
 2229:                     EStr = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("uds rpc server crashed: ~p", [Reason])),
 2230:                     (catch file:write_file("uds_rpc_server_crash."++os:getpid(), EStr)),
 2231:                     halt(EStr)
 2232:             end
 2233:     end.
 2234: 
 2235: start_uds_node(NodeName, LPort) ->
 2236:     Static = "-detached -noinput -proto_dist erl_uds",
 2237:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2238:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2239: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
 2240: 	       _ -> error(no_progname_argument_found)
 2241: 	   end,
 2242:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2243:     NameStr = atom_to_list(NodeName),
 2244:     CmdLine = Prog ++ " "
 2245: 	++ Static
 2246: 	++ " -sname " ++ NameStr
 2247: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
 2248: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2249: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2250:         ++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " start_uds_rpc_server "
 2251:         ++ integer_to_list(LPort),
 2252:     io:format("Starting: ~p~n", [CmdLine]),
 2253:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2254: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2255: 	    unlink(Port),
 2256: 	    erlang:port_close(Port);
 2257: 	Error ->
 2258: 	    error({open_port_failed, Error})
 2259:     end,
 2260:     ok.
 2261: 
 2262: erl_1424(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2263:     {error, Reason} = erl_epmd:names("."),
 2264:     {comment, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Reason: ~p", [Reason]))}.
 2265: 
 2266: net_kernel_start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2267:     MyName = net_kernel_start_tester,
 2268:     register(MyName, self()),
 2269:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, false),
 2270:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, false, false),
 2271:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, true),
 2272:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined).
 2273: 
 2274: net_kernel_start_test(MyName, NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2275:     TestNameStr = "net_kernel_start_test_node-"
 2276:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(seconds))
 2277:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([monotonic,positive])),
 2278:     TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNameStr ++ "@" ++ atom_to_list(gethostname())),
 2279:     CmdLine = net_kernel_start_cmdline(MyName, list_to_atom(TestNameStr),
 2280:                                        NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden),
 2281:     io:format("Starting test node ~p: ~s~n", [TestNode, CmdLine]),
 2282:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2283: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2284:             case DistListen == false of
 2285:                 false ->
 2286:                     ok;
 2287:                 true ->
 2288:                     receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 2289:                     pang = net_adm:ping(TestNode),
 2290:                     ok
 2291:             end,
 2292:             receive
 2293:                 {i_am_alive, Pid, Node, NTT} = Msg ->
 2294:                     IsHidden = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 2295:                     IsVisible = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(visible)),
 2296:                     io:format("IsVisible = ~p~nIsHidden = ~p~n", [IsVisible, IsHidden]),
 2297:                     io:format("Response from ~p: ~p~n", [Node, Msg]),
 2298:                     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 2299:                     catch erlang:port_close(Port),
 2300:                     TestNode = node(Pid),
 2301:                     TestNode = Node,
 2302:                     case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2303:                         true ->
 2304:                             {ok, DefNTT} = application:get_env(kernel, net_ticktime),
 2305:                             DefNTT = NTT;
 2306:                         false ->
 2307:                             NetTickTime = NTT
 2308:                     end,
 2309:                     case DistListen == false orelse Hidden == true of
 2310:                         true ->
 2311:                             true = IsHidden,
 2312:                             false = IsVisible;
 2313:                         false ->
 2314:                             false = IsHidden,
 2315:                             true = IsVisible
 2316:                     end
 2317:             end,
 2318:             ok;
 2319: 	Error ->
 2320: 	    error({open_port_failed, TestNode, Error})
 2321:     end.
 2322: 
 2323: net_kernel_start_cmdline(TestName, Name, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2324:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2325:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2326: 	       {ok, [[Prg]]} -> Prg;
 2327: 	       _ -> error(missing_progname)
 2328: 	   end,
 2329:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:longnames() of
 2330:                      false -> "shortnames";
 2331:                      true -> "longnames"
 2332:                  end,
 2333:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2334:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2335:     Prog ++ " -noinput -noshell -detached -pa " ++ Pa
 2336: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2337: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2338: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " net_kernel_start_do_test "
 2339: 	++ atom_to_list(TestName) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ " "
 2340:         ++ NameStr ++ " " ++ NameDomain
 2341:         ++ case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2342:                true ->
 2343:                    "";
 2344:                false ->
 2345:                    " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickTime) ++
 2346:                        " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickIntensity)
 2347:            end
 2348:         ++ case DistListen == undefined of
 2349:                true -> "";
 2350:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(DistListen)
 2351:            end
 2352:         ++ case Hidden == undefined of
 2353:                true -> "";
 2354:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(Hidden)
 2355:            end.
 2356: 
 2357: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain]) ->
 2358:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2359:                              #{name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain)});
 2360: 
 2361: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity,
 2362:                           DistListen, Hidden]) ->
 2363:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2364:                              #{net_ticktime => list_to_integer(NetTickTime),
 2365:                                name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain),
 2366:                                net_tickintensity => list_to_integer(NetTickIntensity),
 2367:                                dist_listen => list_to_atom(DistListen),
 2368:                                hidden => list_to_atom(Hidden)}).
 2369: 
 2370: net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, Name, Options) ->
 2371:     case net_kernel:start(Name, Options) of
 2372:         {ok, _Pid} ->
 2373:             case maps:get(dist_listen, Options, true) of
 2374:                 false -> receive after 3000 -> ok end;
 2375:                 true -> ok
 2376:             end,
 2377:             Tester = {list_to_atom(TestName), list_to_atom(TestNode)},
 2378:             Tester ! {i_am_alive, self(), node(), net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()},
 2379:             receive after 60000 -> ok end,
 2380:             erlang:halt();
 2381:         Error ->
 2382:             erlang:halt(lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p", [Error])))
 2383:     end.
 2384: 
 2385: differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2386:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2387:     Node = node(),
 2388:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2389:     [] = nodes(),
 2390:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2391: 
 2392:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2393: 
 2394:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2395:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2396:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2397:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2398:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2399:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2400:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2401:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2402:     try
 2403: 
 2404:         %% Verify the cluster
 2405:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2406:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2407: 
 2408:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2409:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2410:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2411:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2412:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2413:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2414:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2415:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2416:         try
 2417: 
 2418:             %% Verify the cluster
 2419:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2420:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2421:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2422: 
 2423:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2424:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2425:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2426:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2427: 
 2428:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2429:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2430:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2431: 
 2432:             %% Verify the cluster
 2433:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2434:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2435:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2436:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2437:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2438:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2439:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2440: 
 2441:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2442:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2443: 
 2444:             %% Verify the cluster
 2445:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2446:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2447:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2448: 
 2449:             %% Reconnect, now node B -> A
 2450:             pong = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2451: 
 2452:             %% Verify the cluster
 2453:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2454:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2455:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2456:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2457:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2458: 
 2459:         after
 2460:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2461:         end
 2462:     after
 2463:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2464:     end,
 2465:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2466:     ok.
 2467: 
 2468: cmdline_setcookie_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2469:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2470:     Node = node(),
 2471:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2472:     [] = nodes(),
 2473:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2474:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2475:     NodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2476:     NodeCookieL = atom_to_list(NodeCookie),
 2477: 
 2478:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2479: 
 2480:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2481:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2482:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2483:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2484:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2485:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2486:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2487:         start_node(
 2488:           "-hidden", NodeAName,
 2489:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL ),
 2490: 
 2491:     try
 2492: 
 2493:         %% Verify the cluster
 2494:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2495:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2496:         NodeCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2497: 
 2498:         true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeACookie] ),
 2499: 
 2500:         %% Start node B with different cookie
 2501:         %% and cookie configuration of mother node and node A
 2502:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2503:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2504:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2505:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2506:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2507:             start_node(
 2508:               "-hidden", NodeBName,
 2509:               "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL++" "
 2510:               "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL++" "
 2511:               "-setcookie "++atom_to_list(NodeA)++" "++NodeACookieL ),
 2512: 
 2513:         try
 2514: 
 2515:             %% Verify the cluster
 2516:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2517:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2518:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2519:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2520:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2521: 
 2522:             %% Connect the nodes
 2523:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2524: 
 2525:             %% Verify the cluster
 2526:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2527:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2528:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2529:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2530:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2531:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2532:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2533: 
 2534:         after
 2535:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2536:         end
 2537:     after
 2538:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2539:     end,
 2540:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2541:     ok.
 2542: 
 2543: connection_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2544:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2545:     Node = node(),
 2546:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2547:     [] = nodes(),
 2548:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2549:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2550: 
 2551:     %% Start node A with dedicated connection cookie
 2552:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2553:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2554:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2555:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2556:     true = NodeACookie =/= erlang:get_cookie(),
 2557:     ConnectionCookieL = BaseName++"_connectionCookie",
 2558:     ConnectionCookie = list_to_atom(ConnectionCookieL),
 2559:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, ConnectionCookie ),
 2560:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2561:         start_node(
 2562:           "", NodeAName,
 2563:           "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL++" "
 2564:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++ConnectionCookieL ),
 2565: 
 2566:     try
 2567: 
 2568:         %% Verify the cluster
 2569:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(),
 2570:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [] ),
 2571:         NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2572:         ConnectionCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, auth, get_cookie, [Node]),
 2573:         ConnectionCookie = erlang:get_cookie( NodeA )
 2574: 
 2575:     after
 2576:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2577:     end,
 2578:     [] = nodes(),
 2579:     ok.
 2580: 
 2581: dyn_differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2582:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2583:     MotherNode = node(),
 2584:     true = MotherNode =/= nonode@nohost,
 2585:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2586:     MotherNodeL = atom_to_list(MotherNode),
 2587:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2588:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2589:     MotherNodeCookieL = atom_to_list(MotherNodeCookie),
 2590:     register(?FUNCTION_NAME, self()),
 2591: 
 2592:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2593:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2594:     DynNodeCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2595:     DynNodeCookie = list_to_atom(DynNodeCookieL),
 2596:     {_NF1, Port1} =
 2597:         start_node_unconnected(
 2598:           "-setcookie "++MotherNodeL++" "++MotherNodeCookieL,
 2599:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2600:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2601:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "cmdline", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2602: 
 2603:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port1),
 2604: 
 2605:     %% Same again, but use erlang:set_cookie/2 to set MotherNodeCookie
 2606:     {_NF2, Port2} =
 2607:         start_node_unconnected(
 2608:           "",
 2609:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2610:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2611:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "set_cookie", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2612: 
 2613:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port2).
 2614: 
 2615: 
 2616: dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port) ->
 2617:     receive
 2618:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2619:             [ DynNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2620:             [ MotherNode ] = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2621:             DynNodeCookie = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2622:             MotherNodeCookie =
 2623:                 rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [MotherNode] ),
 2624:             {ddc_remote_run, DynNode} !
 2625:                 {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2626: 
 2627:             0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port),
 2628: 
 2629:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2630:             ok;
 2631:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 2632:             io:format("~p: ~s", [Port, Data]),
 2633:             dyn_differing_cookies(
 2634:               MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port);
 2635:         Other ->
 2636:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2637:     end.
 2638: 
 2639: ddc_remote_run(MotherNode, [SetCookie, MotherNodeCookieL]) ->
 2640:     nonode@nohost = node(),
 2641:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2642:     MotherNodeCookie = list_to_atom(MotherNodeCookieL),
 2643:     case SetCookie of
 2644:         "set_cookie" ->
 2645:             erlang:set_cookie(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie);
 2646:         "cmdline" ->
 2647:             ok
 2648:     end,
 2649:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(MotherNode),
 2650:     true = net_kernel:connect_node( MotherNode ),
 2651:     [ MotherNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2652:     DynNode = node(),
 2653:     [ DynNode ] = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2654:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie( MotherNode ),
 2655:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2656:     %% Here we get the mother node's default cookie
 2657:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [DynNode] ),
 2658:     DynNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2659:     register(ddc_remote_run, self() ),
 2660:     {dyn_differing_cookies, MotherNode} !
 2661:         {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2662:     receive
 2663:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2664:             true = disconnect_node( MotherNode ),
 2665:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2666:             ok;
 2667:         Other ->
 2668:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2669:     end.
 2670: 
 2671: xdg_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2672:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2673: 
 2674:     TestHome = filename:join(PrivDir, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2675:     ok = file:make_dir(TestHome),
 2676: 
 2677:     HomeEnv = case os:type() of
 2678:               {win32, _} ->
 2679:                   [Drive | Path] = filename:split(TestHome),
 2680:                   [{"APPDATA", filename:join(TestHome,"AppData")},
 2681:                    {"HOMEDRIVE", Drive}, {"HOMEPATH", filename:join(Path)}];
 2682:               _ ->
 2683:                   [{"HOME", TestHome}]
 2684:           end,
 2685: 
 2686:     NodeOpts = #{ env => HomeEnv ++
 2687:                       [{"ERL_CRASH_DUMP", filename:join([TestHome,"erl_crash.dump"])}],
 2688:                   connection => 0 },
 2689: 
 2690:     %% Test that a default .erlang.cookie file is created
 2691:     {ok, CreatorPeer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2692:     UserConfig = peer:call(CreatorPeer, filename, basedir, [user_config,"erlang"]),
 2693:     ?assert(peer:call(CreatorPeer, filelib, is_regular,
 2694:                       [filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie")])),
 2695:     OrigCookie = peer:call(CreatorPeer, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2696:     peer:stop(CreatorPeer),
 2697: 
 2698:     %% Test that the $HOME/.erlang.cookie file takes precedence over XDG
 2699:     XDGCookie = filename:join([UserConfig, ".erlang.cookie"]),
 2700:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(XDGCookie),
 2701:     ok = file:write_file(XDGCookie, "Me want cookie!"),
 2702:     {ok, XDGFI} = file:read_file_info(XDGCookie),
 2703:     ok = file:write_file_info(XDGCookie, XDGFI#file_info{ mode = 8#600 }),
 2704: 
 2705:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2706: 
 2707:     ?assertEqual(OrigCookie, peer:call(Peer, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2708: 
 2709:     peer:stop(Peer),
 2710: 
 2711:     %% Check that XDG cookie works after we delete the $HOME cookie
 2712:     HomeCookie = filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie"),
 2713:     {ok, HomeFI} = file:read_file_info(HomeCookie),
 2714:     ok = file:write_file_info(HomeCookie, HomeFI#file_info{ mode = 8#777 }),
 2715:     ok = file:delete(HomeCookie),
 2716:     {ok, Peer2, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2717:     ?assertEqual('Me want cookie!', peer:call(Peer2, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2718: 
 2719:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 2720: 
 2721:     ok.
 2722: 
 2723: 
 2724: 
 2725: %% Misc. functions
 2726: 
 2727: equal_sets(A, B) ->
 2728:     S = lists:sort(A),
 2729:     case lists:sort(B) of
 2730:         S ->
 2731:             ok;
 2732:         _ ->
 2733:             erlang:error({not_equal_sets, A, B})
 2734:     end.
 2735: 
 2736: run_dist_configs(Func, Config) ->
 2737:     GetOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp -gen_tcp_dist_output_loop "
 2738:         ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " ",
 2739:     GenTcpDistTest = case get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() of
 2740:                          default ->
 2741:                              {"gen_tcp_dist", "-proto_dist gen_tcp"};
 2742:                          size ->
 2743:                              {"gen_tcp_dist (get_size)",
 2744:                               GetOptProlog ++ "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size"}
 2745:                      end,
 2746:     lists:map(fun ({DCfgName, DCfg}) ->
 2747:                       io:format("~n~n=== Running ~s configuration ===~n~n",
 2748:                                 [DCfgName]),
 2749:                       Func(DCfg, Config)
 2750:               end,
 2751:               [{"default", ""}, GenTcpDistTest]).
 2752: 
 2753: start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2754:     Me = self(),
 2755:     Go = make_ref(),
 2756:     io:format("STARTING: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server~n",[]),
 2757:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2758:                                    register(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server, self()),
 2759:                                    Me ! Go,
 2760:                                    gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2761:                            end),
 2762:     receive
 2763:         Go ->
 2764:             ok;
 2765:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, _} ->
 2766:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2767:     end.
 2768: 
 2769: kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2770:     case whereis(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server) of
 2771:         undefined ->
 2772:             ok;
 2773:         Pid ->
 2774:             exit(Pid,kill),
 2775:             %% Sync death, before continuing...
 2776:             false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid)
 2777:     end.
 2778: 
 2779: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2780:     Type = case abs(erlang:monotonic_time(second)) rem 2 of
 2781:                0 -> default;
 2782:                1 -> size
 2783:            end,
 2784:     gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type).
 2785: 
 2786: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type) ->
 2787:     receive
 2788:         {From, Ref} ->
 2789:             From ! {Ref, Type},
 2790:             NewType = case Type of
 2791:                           default -> size;
 2792:                           size -> default
 2793:                       end,
 2794:             gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(NewType)
 2795:     end.
 2796: 
 2797: get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() ->
 2798:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2799:     try
 2800:         gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server ! {self(), Ref},
 2801:         receive
 2802:             {Ref, Type} ->
 2803:                 Type
 2804:         end
 2805:     catch
 2806:         error:badarg ->
 2807:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
 2808:             get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type()
 2809:     end.
 2810: 
 2811: dist_cntrlr_output_test_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2812:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2813:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2814:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2815:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, false),
 2816:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2817:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2818:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2819:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2820: 
 2821: dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2822:     receive
 2823:         dist_data ->
 2824:             %% Outgoing data from this node...
 2825:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket);
 2826:         _ ->
 2827:             ok %% Drop garbage message...
 2828:     end,
 2829:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2830: 
 2831: dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2832:     case erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data(DHandle) of
 2833:         none ->
 2834:             erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data_notification(DHandle);
 2835:         {Size, Data} ->
 2836:             ok = ensure_iovec(Data),
 2837:             Size = erlang:iolist_size(Data),
 2838:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data),
 2839:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket)
 2840:     end.
 2841: 
 2842: ensure_iovec([]) ->
 2843:     ok;
 2844: ensure_iovec([X|Y]) when is_binary(X) ->
 2845:     ensure_iovec(Y).
 2846: 
 2847: monitor_node_state() ->
 2848:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2849:     MonitoringNodes = erts_debug:get_internal_state(monitoring_nodes),
 2850:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2851:     MonitoringNodes.
 2852: 
 2853: 
 2854: check_no_nodedown_nodeup(TimeOut) ->
 2855:     receive
 2856: 	{nodeup, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2857: 	{nodeup, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2858: 	{nodedown, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg});
 2859: 	{nodedown, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg})
 2860:     after TimeOut ->
 2861: 	    ok
 2862:     end.
 2863: 
 2864: print_my_messages() ->
 2865:     {messages, Messages} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2866:     io:format("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2867:     ok.
 2868: 
 2869: 
 2870: sleep(T) -> receive after T * 1000 -> ok end.	
 2871: 
 2872: start_node(_DCfg, Name, Param, this) ->
 2873:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2874:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2875: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, "this") ->
 2876:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2877:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2878: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_atom(Rel) ->
 2879:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2880:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, atom_to_list(Rel)}]}]);
 2881: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_list(Rel) ->
 2882:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2883:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, Rel}]}]).
 2884: 
 2885: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param) ->
 2886:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2887:     test_server:start_node(Name, slave, [{args, NewParam}]).
 2888: 
 2889: start_node(DCfg, Name) ->
 2890:     start_node(DCfg, Name, "").
 2891: 
 2892: stop_node(Node) ->
 2893:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
 2894: 
 2895: get_nodenames(N, T) ->
 2896:     get_nodenames(N, T, []).
 2897: 
 2898: get_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 2899:     Acc;
 2900: get_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 2901:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 2902:     get_nodenames(N-1, T, [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T)
 2903: 					++ "-"
 2904: 					++ ?MODULE_STRING
 2905: 					++ "-"
 2906: 					++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc]).
 2907: 
 2908: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T) ->
 2909:     get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, []).
 2910: 
 2911: get_numbered_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 2912:     Acc;
 2913: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 2914:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 2915:     NL = [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T) ++ integer_to_list(N)
 2916: 		       ++ "-"
 2917: 		       ++ ?MODULE_STRING
 2918: 		       ++ "-"
 2919: 		       ++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc],
 2920:     get_numbered_nodenames(N-1, T, NL).
 2921: 
 2922: wait_until(Fun) ->
 2923:     case Fun() of
 2924: 	true ->
 2925: 	    ok;
 2926: 	_ ->
 2927: 	    receive
 2928: 	    after 100 ->
 2929: 		    wait_until(Fun)
 2930: 	    end
 2931:     end.
 2932: 
 2933: repeat(Fun, 0) when is_function(Fun) ->
 2934:     ok;
 2935: repeat(Fun, N) when is_function(Fun), is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 2936:     Fun(),
 2937:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 2938: 
 2939: no_msgs(Wait) ->
 2940:     receive after Wait -> no_msgs() end.
 2941: 
 2942: no_msgs() ->
 2943:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages).
 2944: 
 2945: block_emu(Ms) ->
 2946:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2947:     Res = erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, Ms),
 2948:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2949:     Res.
 2950: 
 2951:
